content.question:
<math alttext="G e, gas, plus 2 C l 2, gas, is in equilibrium with G e C l 4, gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Ge</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>⇄</mo><mtext>Ge</mtext><msub><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

The value of the equilibrium constant for the reaction represented above is <math alttext="1 times 10 to the 10" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>2.3</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mn>11</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>. What is the value of the equilibrium constant for the following reaction?

<math alttext="2 G e C l 4, gas, is in equilibrium with 2 G e, gas, plus 4 C l 2, gas" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>Ge</mtext><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>⇄</mo><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>Ge</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msub><mrow><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.1em"></mspace><mtext>Cl</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>g</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 20" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.9</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>23</mn> </mrow> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

<math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 10" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>4.3</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>12</mn> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

content.answer: <math alttext="1 times 10 to the negative 20" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle> <mrow> <mn>1.9</mn> <mo>×</mo> <msup> <mrow> <mn>10</mn> </mrow> <mrow> <mrow> <mo>−</mo> <mn>23</mn> </mrow> </mrow> </msup> </mrow> </mstyle> </math>

skill.text: 5.F: Calculate, estimate, or predict an unknown quantity from known quantities by selecting and following a logical computational pathway and attending to precision (e.g., performing dimensional analysis and attending to significant figures).
